The Ghost Word Game is played with two people. In turns, the players must enter a letter that together slowly forms a word. The objective of the game is to add a letter so that no word is formed, but keeping in mind that a word could still be formed.

 If your opponent makes a word, when the word contains more than three characters, you win a round! This means that you can not lose if you make a word consisting of 3 characters or less. However, if those characters are not the beginning of a word (like 'zox'), you still lose a round.

 After you won a round, a point is added to your score which can be viewed in the highscores menu.
